long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Book Showcase is a browser extension where you new tab is replaced by the top 12 New York Times bestseller books everyday so that you stay updated with what books are making waves each day. A search box powered by Bing.com enables you to browse the internet right from the extension page.

How to get started:
Book Showcase is a browser extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to top bestselling books by the New York Times day along with a Bing.com search bar for your convenience. The new tab extension is easy to use and user-friendly.
It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions.

Features:
Access to the top 12 bestseller books that you can buy when you open  your New Tab
Ease of navigation
Search box powered by Bing.com
Clean & seamless user interface 
Completely free to use

Permissions:
It  needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Book Showcase  extension with the features including the access to the customised search bar powered by Bing.com and the option to buy the books on Amazon.com. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Book Showcase " extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Book Showcase ", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove Book Showcase ?", click the Remove button.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://mediastinct.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://mediastinct.com/terms-conditions/) or contact us at dev@mediastinct.com for any queries.

Disclaimer: Book Showcase is an independent project and functions only as a browser extension that has been created to ensure that the top 12 bestselling books can be viewed daily at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
